attributes.action: Abolish the planned Sport Supplements VAT this October
attributes.additional_details:
This October the govenment will be introducing VAT to sports supplement drinks!

This is unjust and has been taken on as a way to boost tax revenue.

In 2012 London hosted a successful Olympics and Paralympics.

Sports stars, gym goers and even your joe bloggs  who use sports supplement to help boost performance, health and well being are now to be charged an extra 20% for trying too stay healthy.

Please sign up and make the government take note! lets abolish the planned VAT this October!
